name: Target Stakeholder Injuries
description: Number of injuries of the organization's target stakeholders during the reporting period.

name: Target Stakeholder Satisfaction Ratio
description: Score reflecting the percentage of the organization’s target stakeholders who are likely to recommend the organization’s product or service as of the end of the reporting period, compared with the percentage who are unlikely to recommend it.

name: Target Stakeholder Setting
description:
Describes the setting of the groups of stakeholders targeted by the organization. Select all that apply:

- Rural
- Urban
- Peri-urban

name: Target Stakeholder Socioeconomics
description:
Describes the socioeconomic groups of stakeholders targeted by the organization as of the end of the reporting period.

Choose all that apply:

- Lower-income
- Lower middle-income
- Upper middle-income
- Other (describe)

name: Target Stakeholder Spending: Connectivity
description: Amount of money spent by an average target stakeholder on connectivity costs during the reporting period.

name: Target Stakeholder Spending: Energy
description: Amount of money spent by the average target stakeholder on sources of energy during the reporting period.

name: Target Stakeholder Spending: Health
description:
Describes a target stakeholder's health spending as a share of their income or expenditures, or disaggregates another metric in terms of health spending as a share of income or expenditures. Select one: 
- Below 10%
- 10–25%
- Greater than 25%

name: Target Stakeholder Spending: Housing
description: Amount of money spent by the average target stakeholder on housing costs during the reporting period.

name: Target Stakeholder Spending: Total
description: Average amount of money spent by target stakeholders during the reporting period.

name: Target Stakeholders
description:
Describes which entities the organization seeks to benefit through its products, services, and operations as of the end of the reporting period.
The reporting period is the time from the Report Start Date (OD6951) to the Report End Date (OD7111). 

Choose all that apply:

Planet
Suppliers
Employees
Distributors
Clients (for example, students, patients, residents, or smallholders)
Microenterprises
Small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs)
Communities: Historically Marginalized
Communities: Urban
Communities: Rural
Communities: Coastal
Communities: Other
Other

name: Teacher Attendance Rate
description: Rate of teacher attendance during the reporting period.

name: Teachers Employed
description: Number of full- and part-time teachers employed by the organization as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Teachers Qualified
description: Number of teachers at the organizations as of the end of the reporting period who have obtained training or have qualifications that meet or exceed the minimum requirements of the local area.

name: Teaching Experience
description: Average number of years of formal education for teachers and instructors as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Technology Type
description:
Describes the type(s) of technologies provisioned, enabled, or adopted by an organization or their clients or communities served, during a reporting period. 

Choose all that apply: 
- Information and Communication Technology
   - Internet of Things (IoT)
   - Artificial Intelligence (AI)
   - Big Data Analytics
   - Blockchain
- Renewable Energy Technology:
   - Solar Power
   - Wind Power
   - Hydropower
- Climate Technology:
   - Precision Agriculture
   - Early warning systems
   - Remote Sensing
   - Biodiversity Monitoring
   - Waste Management
   - Water Treatment
   - Recycling
   - Adaptation and resilience
- Transportation Technology:
   - Electric Vehicles (EVs)
   - Autonomous Vehicles
- Healthcare Technology:
   - Telemedicine
   - Medical Imaging
   - Biotechnology
- Construction and Infrastructure Technology:
   - 3D Printing
   - Smart Buildings
- Financial Technology (Fintech):
   - Mobile Payments
   - Peer-to-Peer Lending
- Educational Technology (EdTech):
   - Learning Management Systems (LMS)
   - Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR)
   - Carbon Capture and Storage (CCS) Technologies:
   - Direct Air Capture
   - Carbon Sequestration
- Other (Describe)

name: Temporary Employee Wages
description: Value of wages (including bonuses and excluding benefits) paid to all temporary employees of the organization during the reporting period.

name: Temporary Employees
description: Number of temporary employees paid by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Temporary Employees Hours Worked
description: Number of paid hours worked by temporary employees of the organization during the reporting period.

name: Temporary Employees: Female
description: Number of female temporary employees paid by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Theory of Change
description: Describes the theory of change of the organization.

name: Threatened Species Policy
description: Indicates whether the organization implements policies to protect threatened species that reside in habitats affected by the organization's operations.

name: Total Assets
description: Value, as of the end of the reporting period, of all of the organization's assets.

name: Total Deposits
description: Value of the organization’s customer deposits, whether voluntary, compulsory, demand, or term, as well as all other liabilities from customers as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Total Expenses
description: Value of all expenditures incurred by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Total Liabilities
description: Value of the organization’s liabilities as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Total Personal Connectivity Devices
description: Average number of connectivity devices utilized in each client household during the reporting period.

name: Total Revenue
description: Value of all revenue received by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Toxic Materials
description: Amount of toxic materials used in the organization's manufacturing processes during the reporting period.

name: Traceability System
description: Indicates whether the organization implements a traceability system for its raw materials.

name: Training Type
description:
Describes the types of trainings completed by individuals as a result of the organization's activities during the reporting period.

Choose all that apply:
 - Enterprise or business development training
 - Vocational or technical training
 - Anti-harassment training
 - Racial equity training
 - General social and environmental performance training
 - Undisclosed

name: Type of Financial Institution
description:
Describes what type of financial institution the organization is, if applicable. Select all that apply:

- Community Action Agency (CAA)
- Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI)
- Credit Union/Cooperative
- Loan Fund, including microenterprise fund or Multibank Community Development Corporation (CDC)
- Non-Banking Financial Institution/Non-Banking Financial Corporation (NBFI/NBFC)
- Non-Profit/Non-Governmental Organization, including Community Development Corporation (CDCs)
- Rural Bank
- Thrift, Bank, Bank Holding Company
- Venture Capital Fund
- Other

name: Type of Land Area
description:
Describes the type(s) of land present on hectares directly or indirectly controlled by the organization. Report for hectares controlled at any point during the reporting period. 
Choose all that apply: 
- Urban/built-up land
- Agricultural land 
- Rangeland 
- Forest land 
- Water areas 
- Wetland 
- Barren land 
- Tundra 
- Perennial snow or ice

name: Unit of Measure
description:
Describes the unit of measure for reporting products or services sold, produced, exported, or installed by the organization. 

Select one:
- British thermal units (Btu)
- Gigawatt hours (GWh)
- Hectares
- Hours
- Joules
- Kilograms
- Kilometers (Km)
- Kilowatt-hours (kWh)
- Licenses
- Liters
- Pounds
- Quintiles
- Square feet
- Square meters
- Tons
- Other

Note: Several metrics are reported in conjunction with this metric, such as Units/Volume Sold: Total (PI1263).

name: Units/Volume Produced
description: Amount of the product/service produced by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased at Price Premium
description: Units/volume from individuals and organizations that sold to the organization and that have received a price premium during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Individuals: Certified
description: Certified units/volume purchased from individuals who sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Individuals: Female
description: Units/volume purchased from female individuals who sold to the organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Individuals: Historically Marginalized
description: Units/volume purchased from individuals belonging to groups historically marginalized on the basis of race and/or ethnicity who sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Individuals: Smallholder
description: Units/volume purchased from smallholder farmers who sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Individuals: Total
description: Units/volume from individuals who sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Organizations: Certified
description: Organizations should footnote details on the certification and all other assumptions used, including source of data. See usage guidance for further information.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Organizations: Local
description: Units/volume from local organizations that sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Organizations: SME
description: Units/volume from small- to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) that sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Purchased from Supplier Organizations: Total
description: Units/volume from organizations that sold to the reporting organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Replaced
description: Number of status-quo products that were replaced by products sold during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Sold: Certified
description: Amount of the product/service sold by the organization as certified during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Sold: Exported
description: Amount of the product/service exported by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Sold: Free
description: Amount of the product/service provided by the organization for free during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Sold: Lost/Leaked
description: Amount of the product/service provided by the organization for free as a result of loss or leakage during the reporting period.

name: Units/Volume Sold: No Direct Payment
description: Amount of the product/service sold during the reporting period for which no direct payment was provided to the organization at the time of service but for which the organization expects to be reimbursed.

name: Units/Volume Sold: Total
description: Amount of the product/service sold by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Capacity Building and Advisory Services Provided
description: Value of the investing organization's support for capacity-building efforts at investee companies as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Value of Carbon Credits Purchased
description: Value of carbon credits purchased by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Commercial or Retail Infrastructure Financed
description: Value of commercial or retail infrastructure projected to be built or renovated as a result of investments made by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Community Development Contributions
description: Value of payments made by the organization during the reporting period towards activities that benefit local communities.

name: Value of Community Facilities Financed
description: Value of community facilities projected to be built, renovated, or purchased as a result of investments made by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Community Infrastructure
description: Describes the value of natural or built infrastructure accessed, managed or owned by the community for collective wellbeing, that are built new, repaired or upgraded by the organization.

name: Value of Equity Investments Closed
description: Value of equity investments closed by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Equity Investments Outstanding
description: Value of equity investments on the organization's balance sheet at the end of the reporting period.

name: Value of Fines and Settlements
description: Value of payments made by the organization as legal or regulatory fines and settlements during the reporting period.

name: Value of Housing Units Financed
description: Value of housing projected to be constructed or preserved as a result of investments made by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Investments in Communities Historically Marginalized Due to Race and/or Ethnicity
description: Value of the investing organization's assets under management deployed to communities that are predominantly populated by groups historically marginalized due to race and/or ethnicity as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Value of Investments in Company: Outstanding
description: Value of the investing organization's outstanding investment in a company as of the end of the reporting period. See usage guidance for details.

name: Value of Investments in Company: Total
description: Value of the investing organization's investment in a company as of the beginning of the investment.

name: Value of Loans Disbursed
description: Value of loans disbursed by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Loans Fully Repaid on Time
description: Value of the organization’s loans due for complete payback during the reporting period (but disbursed at any time) that were repaid no later than their due dates.

name: Value of Loans Outstanding
description: Value of disbursed loans remaining on the organization's balance sheet at the end of the reporting period.

name: Value of New Education Facility Materials
description: Value of new educational facility materials provided to students by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of New Education Instructional Materials
description: Value of new educational instructional materials provided to students by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Value of Voluntary Savings Accounts
description: Value of voluntary savings accounts managed by the organization, including demand deposits and time deposits, as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Vehicle Distance Traveled
description: Distance traveled by vehicles owned, operated, or sold by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Vehicle/Container Inactive Hours
description: Average number of hours spent inactive or waiting (inclusive of turnaround and dwell time) by a vehicle or container during the reporting period.

name: Vocational/Technical Training
description: Number of students receiving vocational or technical training during the reporting period.

name: Volunteer Hours
description: Number of hours worked by non-employee volunteers who supported the organization during the reporting period.

name: Wage Equity
description: Ratio of the wages paid during the reporting period to the highest-compensated full-time employee (including bonus and excluding benefits) compared to the lowest-paid full-time employee.

name: Wage Premium
description: Ratio of the additional average wage paid to employees of the organization compared to the average wage paid for a similar job in a similar industry or category and organization in the local market as of the end of the reporting period.

name: WASH Facilities Type
description:
Describes the type of water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH) facilities available on-site as a result of the organization's activities during the reporting period.

Choose all that apply: 
- Drinking water facilities
- Handwashing facilities
- Menstrual hygiene waste disposal
- Sanitation facilities
- Other (describe)

name: Waste Disposed: Composted
description: Amount of waste disposed by the organization through composting during the reporting period.

name: Waste Disposed: Incinerated
description: Amount of waste disposed by the organization through incineration during the reporting period.

name: Waste Disposed: Landfill
description: Amount of waste disposed by the organization in landfills during the reporting period.

name: Waste Disposed: Other
description: Amount of waste disposed by the organization through other means during the reporting period.

name: Waste Disposed: Recycled/Reused
description: Amount of waste disposed by the organization through reuse and recycling during the reporting period.

name: Waste Disposed: Total
description: Amount of waste disposed by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Waste Produced: Hazardous Waste
description: Amount of hazardous waste created by the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Waste Produced: Non-Hazardous Waste
description: Amount of non-hazardous waste created by the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Waste Produced: Total
description: Amount of waste created by the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Waste Reduced
description: Amount of waste reduced by the organization during the reporting period through programs for substitution, recycling, or recovery.

name: Waste Reductions from Products Sold
description: Amount of waste reduced over the lifetime of products sold by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Waste Reductions from Services Sold
description: Amount of waste reduced during the reporting period as a result of the organization's services.

name: Wastewater Removed
description: Volume of wastewater safely removed from client premises by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Wastewater Treated
description: Volume of wastewater treated by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Wastewater Treatment Compliance
description: Indicates whether the organization's practices related to the discharge of wastewater comply with local legal requirements.

name: Water Conservation Strategy
description: Indicates whether the organization implements a conservation strategy to reduce its water usage.

name: Water Conserved
description: Volume of water usage reduced as a result of the organization's water conservation efforts during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Groundwater
description: Volume of groundwater used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Municipal
description: Volume of water drawn from municipal water sources used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Rainwater
description: Volume of rainwater used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Recycled
description: Volume of recycled water used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Regions with High Water Stress
description: Volume of water used from regions with high or extremely high baseline water stress during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Surface Water
description: Volume of surface water used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Total
description: Volume of water used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumed: Wastewater
description: Volume of wastewater used for the organization's operations during the reporting period.

name: Water Consumption of Product
description: Volume of water used (consumed) over the lifetime of a product or system operated according to planned capacity.

name: Water Consumption of Product Replaced
description: Average volume of water that would have been consumed by the replaced product during the lifetime of the organization's product.

name: Water Discharged
description: Volume of effluents, used water, and unused water released, during the reporting period, to surface water, groundwater, seawater, or a third party and for which the organization has no further use.

name: Water Provided for Sale: Potable
description: Volume of potable water provided and delivered to offtaker(s) during the reporting period.

name: Water Provided for Sale: Total
description: Volume of water provided and delivered to offtaker(s) during the reporting period.

name: Water Provision Capacity of Product: Potable
description: Volume of potable water provided over the lifetime of a product or system operated according to planned capacity.

name: Water Provision Capacity of Product: Total
description: Volume of water provided over the lifetime of a product or system operated according to planned capacity.

name: Water Provision Capacity of Products Sold: Potable
description: Volume of potential potable water provided over the lifetimes of all products sold during the reporting period.

name: Water Provision Capacity of Products Sold: Total
description: Volume of potential water provided over the lifetimes of all products sold during the reporting period.

name: Water Quality Practices
description: Indicates whether the organization employs management practices to protect water quality.

name: Water Quality Standards Pass Rate
description: Percent of water samples at distribution or network sampling points that meet national standards for chemical water quality, residual chlorine, and microbiological contamination during the reporting period.

name: Water Savings from Products Sold
description: Volume of water saved over the lifetimes of all products sold during the reporting period.

name: Water Savings from Services Sold
description: Volume of water saved during the reporting period as a result of the organization's services sold.

name: Water Treatment Capacity of Product: Potable
description: Volume of water treated to become potable over the lifetime of a product or system operated according to planned capacity.

name: Water Treatment Capacity of Product: Total
description: Volume of water treated over the lifetime of a product or system operated according to planned capacity.

name: Water Treatment Capacity of Products Sold
description: Volume of potential water treated over the lifetimes of all products sold during the reporting period.

name: Water Treatment Level
description:
Describes the level of treatment that discharged water received during the reporting period.

Choose all that apply: 
- Primary treatment
- Secondary treatment
- Tertiary treatment
- No treatment

name: Water Type
description:
Describes the type of water withdrawn, consumed, or discharged as a result of investments made by the organization during the reporting period.

Choose all that apply:
- Rainwater
- Recycled Water
- Groundwater
- Surface Water 
- Seawater
- Third Party: Municipal
- Third Party: Wastewater
- Other (describe)

name: Water Withdrawn
description: Volume of all water drawn from surface water, groundwater, seawater, or a third party for any use by the organization during the reporting period.

name: Weighted Average Tenor of Loans Outstanding
description: Weighted average tenor of loans outstanding on the organization’s balance sheet as of the end of the reporting period, measured in months.

name: Women's Career Advancement Initiative
description: Indicates whether the organization has an initiative in place to advance women in their workforce.

name: Worker Freedom of Association Policy
description: Indicates whether the organization has a written policy to monitor, evaluate, and ensure its workers' freedom of association.

name: Worker Safety Policy
description: Indicates whether the organization has policies in place to monitor, evaluate, and ensure worker safety.

name: Working Capital
description: Value of the organization's operating liquidity as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Working Capital Ratio
description: Ratio of the organization’s current assets compared to current liabilities as of the end of the reporting period.

name: Working Hour Policy
description: Indicates whether the organization has policies in place to monitor, evaluate, and ensure appropriate working hours of employees, as well as a system to monitor compliance.

name: Year Founded
description: Year the organization was founded.

name: Length of Coastline Protected
description: Total length of coastal areas brought under official protection status or subject to formal conservation measures (such as coastal buffer zones, community-led conservation agreements, or enforcement of no-development zones) as a result of the organization’s activities.

name: Area of Seaweed Farm Certified
description: Total area of seaweed farming operations certified by a recognized third-party sustainability or environmental standard as a result of the organization’s activities.

name: Sustainable Livelihood Opportunities Supported
description: The number of individuals or households whose livelihood activities, income-generating pursuits, or productive assets have been supported, improved, or sustained through the organization's interventions during the reporting period. This may include support for employed or self-employed individuals, farmers, fishers, artisans, small business owners, or those involved in informal or community-based work

name: Marine Environmental Pressures
description: Indicates natural and human-induced pressures faced by marine environments.

name: Area of Marine Habitat Protected
description: Total surface area of marine habitats newly designated as Marine Protected Areas (MPAs), or new habitats added to an existing MPA network, as a result of the organization’s activities.

name: Area of Marine Habitat Restored
description: Total surface area of marine habitats that have undergone restoration activities.

name: Restoration Success Rate
description: Percentage of restored areas that show measurable improvements in biodiversity, ecosystem function, or resilience post-restoration (e.g., survival rate of transplanted corals or re-established seagrass coverage).

name: Marine Livelihoods
description: Sustainable livelihood options made available to coastal communities that are primarily dependent on the ocean and coastal ecosystems.

name: Marine Biodiversity Assessment
description: Indicates whether the organization has undertaken biodiversity-related assessments to evaluate the biological diversity and ecosystem condition present on the coastal area and marine habitat that is directly or indirectly controlled by the organization.

name: Loss of Marine Habitat
description: Total surface area of marine or coastal habitat lost, including both direct destruction and unrestored degradation, as a result of the financed activity, such as coastal infrastructure development, dredging, seabed mining, aquaculture, or other marine and coastal land use changes.

name: Volume of Plastic Removed
description: The total volume of plastic waste physically removed or diverted from natural environments, such as aquatic, marine, terrestrial, or urban ecosystems, through clean-up activities, waste interception infrastructure, or other interventions. This includes macroplastics and microplastics collected before entering or while present in these environments.

name: Species Recovery
description: The annual percentage change in the population size of a target species within a defined area, compared to a scientifically established baseline.
